    • Constructor Detail

      • DenseLayer

        public DenseLayer(int size,
                  int previousLayerSize,
                  java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double> activationFunction)
        Created a Dense Layer and assign random controls to all its weights and bias.
        Parameters:
        size - the number of neurons of this layer
        previousLayerSize - the previous layer's number of neurons (to adjust the number of weights accordingly)
        activationFunction - the activation function of this layer

      • DenseLayer

        public DenseLayer(double[][] weights,
                  java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double> activationFunction)
        Created a Dense layer by attributing its weights and bias
        Parameters:
        weights - A matrix of weights. Its size becomes the size of this layer. The first column is the current neuron and the rows are all the connections to the neurons.
        activationFunction - the activation function

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        the data of all the outputings nodes
